attributes.action: Stop hospital's charging disabled and chronically ill to park
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We ask that hospitals are stopped making the disabled and chronically ill patients pay for using their car parks.
These people are often on benfits and can not find the costs to park when they need to visit the hospital for an appointment.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
